Issue Title: View Cart button leads to the "Oops! Something went wrong!" page instead of Cart page
Steps To Reproduce:
1. Open PDP
2. Add product to the cart
3. Click on Cart icon
4. Click on View Cart button
Expected Result: Cart page is open
Actual Result: Empty page with  "Oops! Something went wrong!" message is open

Issue Title: There is no icon for My Account through the whole site
Steps To Reproduce:
1. Open home page
2. Sign in
3. Go to any category
4. Go to My Account page
Expected Result: There is My Account icon that let customers reach easily their accounts
Actual Result:
There is no My Account icon

But now you can return to My Account from any site's page by clicking Sign in

Issue Title: Logo is hidden behind navigation bar
Steps To Reproduce: 1. Open Home page
Expected Result: Logo is fully visible at the top of the home page
Actual Result: Logo is hidden behind navigation bar

Issue Title: The load time of home page is 3,77 seconds
Steps To Reproduce: 1. Open Home page and check it load time via DevTools
Expected Result: Load time is about 2-3 seconds
Actual Result: Load time is about 3,77 seconds

Issue Title: There is no scrollbar through the whole site
Steps To Reproduce:
1. Open the site
2. Scroll the pages of the site down and up with the help of scrollbar

Note: now it's possible to do with keyboard only
Expected Result: Scroll bar is visible and it's possible to scroll it down and up with it
Actual Result: There is no scrollbar on the site's pages

Issue Title: There is no option to add product to the wishlist from PDP or PLP but there is My Wishlist page in My Account
Steps To Reproduce:
1. Open homepage
2. Sign in 
3. Go to PDP
Expected Result: There is option/button/icon to add product to wishlist
Actual Result: There is no opportunity to add product to the wishlist

Issue Title: There is no possibility to see all search results on search results page
Steps To Reproduce:
1. Open home page
2. Enter search request in the search field
Expected Result: There is option to see all search results on search results page
Actual Result: There is no possibility to see all search results on search results page

Issue Title: The size of Garden block image is 330 kB
Steps To Reproduce:
1. Open home page
2. Check the size of Garden block image with Chrome DevTools
Expected Result: The size of Garden block image is no more than 35 kB
Actual Result: The size of Garden block image is more than 35 kB

Issue Title: There is no filters on PLP for products
Steps To Reproduce: 1. Open PLP
Expected Result: There is filter for products (for example, by type, color, price, country of manufacture)
Actual Result: There is no filter for products

Issue Title: Products' pictures are missing
Steps To Reproduce: 1. Open product list page
Expected Result: All pictures are placed on site's pages
Actual Result: A lot of product's pictures are missing through the site's pages

Issue Title: All icons of social media lead to its sign up pages but not to the site's pages on it
Steps To Reproduce:
1. Open home page and scroll down to the footer
2. Click Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest and Instagram icons
Expected Result: All icons of social media lead to the site's page on it
Actual Result: All icons of social media lead to its sign up pages

Issue Title: Categories' dropdowns doesn't hide back after picking category from PLP
Steps To Reproduce:
1. Open PLP
2. Click any category that has dropdown
4. Move coursor away from categorie's name or dropdown
Expected Result: Dropdown hides
Actual Result: Dropdown doesn't hide and stay expanded

Issue Title: The number of products at the paginator is displayed wrong - 14 or 13 instead of 12 on the first pages of New In, Portmeirion and Bad&Bath categories' pages
Steps To Reproduce:
1. Open PLP pages
2. Scroll down to the paginator
Expected Result: Number of products is displayed correctly (same as number of products on the PLP)
Actual Result: Number of products is not the same as number of products on these PLP

Issue Title: Columns are not aligned to each other
Steps To Reproduce:
1. Open the site's home page
2. Scroll down to the footer
Expected Result: Columns aligned to each other on the same level
Actual Result: Columns About Us and Comtact are placed lower then Customer Care column

Issue Title: Text are in Latin language
Steps To Reproduce: 1. Open Terms & Conditions page
Expected Result: Text of Terms & Conditions is written in English
Actual Result: Text of Terms & Conditions is written in Latin

Issue Title: There is no content on About Us page
Steps To Reproduce: 1. Open About Us page
Expected Result: Text about company is displayed on page
Actual Result: There is no text about company on page

Issue Title: The PDP pages through the whole site lead to 404 page on Microsoft Edge v44.18362.449.0
Steps To Reproduce:
1. Open any product category with Microsoft Edge v44.18362.449.0
2. Click on any product to go to PDP
Expected Result: PDP is open
Actual Result: 404 page is open

Issue Title: Sign Up and Receive block has wrong size and alignment on Microsoft Edge v44.18362.449.0
Steps To Reproduce: 1. Open Home page with Microsoft Edge v44.18362.449.0 and scroll down
Expected Result: Sign Up and Receive block has correct size and proper alignment
Actual Result: Sign Up and Receive block has wrong size and alignment

Issue Title: There is no opportunity to go to the Home page from any page on Android 11 on Samsung Internet browser v 16.2.1.56
Steps To Reproduce:
1. Open any PDP or PLP with Samsung Internet v 16.2.1.56
2. Go to the Home page
Expected Result: There is possibility to go back to the Home page from any page of the site
Actual Result: There is possibility to go back to the Home page from any page of the site

Issue Title: The pop up "Sorry the product is out of stock!" overlaps with product description on Android 11 on Samsung Internet browser v 16.2.1.56
Steps To Reproduce:
1. Open any PDP of product which is out of stock with Samsung Internet v 16.2.1.56 
2. Click Add to the Cart button
Expected Result: The pop up "Sorry the product is out of stock!" do not overlaps with product description and clearly visible for user
Actual Result: The pop up "Sorry the product is out of stock!" overlaps with product description
